result.text: {{firstName}} is imaginative and outgoing. {{firstName}} is interested in learning through new experiences. They are creative and curious, and are open to change and variety. They are flexible, great at coming up with out-of-the-box solutions and very empathetic towards others. They are great at working with others. They enjoy discussing problems and have no problem voicing their opinions. People often describe them as friendly and energetic.
{{firstName}}'s top soft skills are problem solving and adaptivity.

According to research, individuals with this personality type tend to prefer and excel in roles that enable them to use their creativity and experience new things every day. Because of this, they tend to be a good fit for roles in marketing or arts.

As {{firstName}} was ranked better than the majority of their peers in their problem solving skills, they are relatively good thinkers who use a mix of intuition and logic to come up with solutions. This attribute helps them with viewing problems as challenges and learning from them. As {{firstName}} was also ranked better than the majority of their peers in adaptivity, they are also relatively adaptable and open to change. This attribute helps them with looking ahead and having the situational awareness to persist against challenges.

key_performance_score.comments: The candidate scores below average against the benchmark on adaptivity
The candidate scores below average against the benchmark on motivation
The candidate scores below average against the benchmark on problem solving
